page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: Religion is:_ "something that involves worshipping God" :-"The belief in a spritual presence" :-"I think religion has gradually deteriorated over the years.The principle of believing in God still exists but it has gradually become less and less important among people." "I don't associate God with religion because I think that God watches and helps us,whereas religion consists of stories and obeying things or people." The vicar at St.Catherine's Church said that they have three services every Sunday and there is a Sunday School and a creche. There is one service during the week and a Mothers Union group and a Girls Friendly Society. The parish is joined with that of Aston Flamville which have one service a month.
